xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 29 January 2014
xwikidoc.content: <akats> has joined #phenotips 11:04 <akats> Is the JSON export implemented in the frontend UI? I found the service class in the java code and the Patient class (exports some json), but I can't seem to find an export JSON in the frontend UI. 11:22 <sdumitriu> akats: There's no UI for it yet 11:22 <sdumitriu> Just the backend 11:24 <akats> Would you like me to make a UI for it? And should I put the versioning code into the PhenoTipsPatient class (make a separate class in the same folder and then reference it in the PhenoTipsPatient class)? 11:25 <sdumitriu> No UI yet 11:26 <sdumitriu> It's more complex 11:26 <sdumitriu> I don't understand the second question 11:27 <sdumitriu> We'll be there in 20 minutes 11:28 <akats> Ok. I'll ask you then. 12:22 <akats> How would I test my changes in patient-data? 12:22 <sdumitriu1> To check that it works? 12:23 <sdumitriu1> Just make a new document (not a patient record), and write in it: {{velocity}}$services.patients.getPatientById('P0000001').toJSON(){{/velocity}} 12:26 <akats> well that was obvious. thanks 13:21 <akats> Ok. So I've got one line left to test, but that requires me to rebuild the whole project and will take while. 13:21 <akats> The rest is tested and works. Comparison here https://github.com/soLEED/phenotips-1/compare/phenotips:master...soLEED:issue-692-693?expand=1 13:21 <akats> Also I combined the issues 692 and 693 since it seemed logical. 13:21 <sdumitriu1> Yep, combining is OK 13:22 <sdumitriu1> Will check in a few minutes, working on something else 14:46 <akats> has quit
